Shabtis raised among the secret [Pharasmin](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) sect of the Carters Consortium are trained to destroy [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) and the necromancers who create them. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 37 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 [Shabti Slayer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2423) **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 84 **Perception** +28; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +28, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Boneyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +24, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +25, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +28 **Str** +5 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67), _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [light hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=29)_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_, [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14), _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_ --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +28 **Will** +25 **HP** 255 **Immunities** [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) **Resistances** [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) 15 **Immortal** Shabtis don't age naturally and can't die of old age. Spells and effects that cause aging still affect a shabti as normal. They also can't be turned into [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160).
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _longsword_ +32 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d8+13 slashing plus final rest **Melee** _light hammer_ +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d6+13 bludgeoning plus final rest **Ranged** crossbow +31 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d8+8 piercing plus final rest **Ranged** _light hammer_ +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 3d6+13 bludgeoning plus final rest **Final Rest** A shabti slayer's Strikes affect [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures with the effects of a _ghost touch_ property rune and deal 2d10 positive damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures. **Prayer-Blessed Blade** **Requirements** The shabti slayer has successfully identified an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) with [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26); **Effect** The shabti slayer prays to [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) to bless their weapon, enabling them to exploit the weaknesses of an undead they've identified with Recall Knowledge. If the identified undead has a resistance that can be bypassed by a special material or a weakness to a special material (such as [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375), [darkwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=376), or [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)), weapons wielded by the shabti slayer count as that special material for 1 minute. If the creature has multiple materials that qualify, the shabti slayer chooses which material their weapon counts as for the duration. **Quick Draw** The shabti slayer draws a weapon using the Interact action, then Strikes with that weapon. **Two-Weapon Flurry** **Frequency** once per round; **Requirements** A shabti slayer is wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand; **Effect** A slayer lashes out with both weapons. They Strike twice, once with each weapon.
name: Shabti Slayer
